# Bricks Bucket: Zeplin API

>**IMPORTANT NOTICE**
>
>This repository is part of the [Bricks Bucket project](https://github.com/javier-games/upm-bricks-bucket), which was canceled in 2022. This repository will remain publicly archived for reference and forking purposes.

## Overview

This Unity package provides C# model classes for the [Zeplin API](https://docs.zeplin.dev/docs/welcome), enabling seamless integration of Zeplin design assets and data into Unity projects. The models make it easy to interact with Zeplin's data structure, facilitating Unity-based workflows that utilize design assets and specifications directly from Zeplin.

### Package Details

- **Package Name:**
    ```
    games.javier.upm.bricksbucket.web.zeplin
    ```
- **Display Package Name:**
    ```
    Javier Games
    ```
- **NPM Registry URL:**
    ```
    https://registry.npmjs.org
    ```
- **Scope(s):**
    ```
    games.javier
    ```

## Installation

The package can be installed through multiple channels as [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/games.javier.upm.bricksbucket.web.zeplin), [OpenUPM](https://openupm.com/packages/games.javier.upm.bricksbucket.web.zeplin) or a downloadable Tarball from the [Releases section](https://github.com/javier-games/upm-zeplin/releases) of this repository or from the dedicated [itch.io page](https://javier-games.itch.io/bricks-bucket).
For detailed installation instructions, please refer to the guide on our [installation documentation page](https://installation.upm.javier.games).

## Contributing

This repository is archived and no longer actively maintained. Forks and community-driven improvements are welcome.
